data.title: Bajamal Cabinet 2001
data.text:
Cabinet of YemenDate formed4 April 2001Date dissolved16 May 2003People and organisationsHead of stateAli Abdullah SalehHead of governmentAbdul Qadir BajamalHistoryPredecessorAl-Iryani CabinetSuccessorBajamal Cabinet 2003

First Bajamal cabinet was the cabinet of Yemen led by Yemeni prime minister Abdul Qadir Bajamal from 4 April 2001 to 16 May 2003.[1][2]

← Government →

( 4 April 2001 – 16 May 2003 )
